channel.title: Suit on Simba Tango

item.title: Tailored for Tango
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ wmacphail –Come back here! You are not entering the floor without buttoning your jacket! Her voice left no doubt, and the young aspiring dancer stepped back, buttoned his jacket and went back on the dance floor. He was smiling, but he would not commit the same error again. In one of my very first tango lessons, I was told that the Argentine dancers would never take off their jacket for dancing.
